contribute\/doc.md.Si vous souhaitez améliorer les traducti: If you want to improve the translations you can report it on
contribute\/doc.md.Si vous maîtriser une des langues de Jee: If you master one of the Jeedom languages and wish to go further, you can request access to the translation system, which allows you to correct all the translations of each language of the different versions of the Core and of the official plugins

contribute\/doc.md.A la traduction, la partie fr_FR sera au: When translating, the fr_FR part will be automatically adapted
